CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Under normal market conditions the Trust will invest at least 80% of its total assets in equity securities issued by U.S. and nonU.S. science andtechnology companies in any market capitalization range selected for their rapid and sustainable growth potential from the development advancement and use of science andor technology andor potential to generate current income from advantageous dividend yields .
